notes: *This is a testing release, it may not be that viable with saves that have a large amount of decor types
Recipes are now in one job
MakerMaker and other decor maker blocks made into a single DecorMaker job where all the decor blocks are crafted
category Changes
Texture added for the decor maker
icon added for the decor maker
made failsafe better
fixed a issue where there would be alot of exceptions on a new world creation
file will now be copied over when a new world is created
the blocks that get generated now use height maps
maker maker no longer makes infinite makers
maker locale added
fixed Raised Quarter blocks making a typelist file in the mod directory
minor fix for modmanager
All meshes added
collisions fixed
basic icons added
config per save added
typelist showing what types have been generated added
failsafe for missing file added
editable example file (will get overwritten with updates)
Logger added for easy debuging
